loading.searchingDataspace: Searching through the dataspace for available data...
loading.establishingConnections: Establishing secure connections to data sources...
loading.lookingForRegistries: Looking for known registries in cache...
loading.extendedWait: It's taking a bit more than expected, probably the access negotiation is still going (approx 10s). This negotiation is done only on the first request.
loading.errorMessage: This is taking much longer than expected. There may be an error in the initial connection/negotiation process. Please contact your administrator.
loading.dataRetrieved: Data has been successfully retrieved and is ready to display

catalogParts.noPartsAvailable: No catalog parts available, please check your ichub-backend connection/configuration.

serializedParts.sortHint: Click on column headers to sort • Use column filters for search

errors.connectionError: Connection error. Please check your network.
errors.noPartnersAvailable: No partners available. Please add partners first.
errors.failedToLoadPartners: Failed to load partners. Backend may be unavailable.
errors.customLimitRequired: Please enter a custom limit or select a predefined option
errors.customLimitRange: Custom limit must be a number between 1 and 1000
errors.noDtrsFound: No Digital Twin Registries found for partner "{{bpnl}}". Please verify the BPNL is correct and if the partner has a Connector (with a reachable DTR) connected in the same dataspace as you.
errors.noDigitalTwinsFound: No digital twins found for the specified criteria. Please try different search parameters.
errors.directNavigationNotSupported: Direct navigation to page {{page}} is not supported. Please use next/previous navigation.
errors.noMorePages: No more pages available in that direction.
errors.errorLoadingPage: Error loading page. Please try again.
errors.errorSearchingParts: Error searching for parts. Please try again.
errors.unableToLoadPartners: Unable to load partner list from backend. You can still enter a custom BPNL manually.
